phrase: «Wake the fuck up, Samurai! We have a city to burn!» -
author: Johny Silverhand

phrase: «I used to be an adventurer like you, then I took an arrow in the knee.» -
author: Some stranger

phrase: «Does it matter if I put this in my jug or not? Get it? Jug or not?» -
author: Juggernaut

phrase: «The right man in the wrong place makes all the difference in the world.» -
author: GMAN
